metadata.title: Cancer Research Institute
metadata.description: Leading research institute dedicated to cancer research and treatment development

home.title: Cancer Research Institute
home.subtitle: Dedicated to advancing cancer research and developing innovative treatments

news.title: Latest News
news.noNews: No news available at the moment

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to advance scientific knowledge about cancer and develop effective treatments through innovative research and collaboration.

research.title: Research Focus
research.description: We focus on understanding the molecular mechanisms of cancer development, identifying new therapeutic targets, and developing novel treatment approaches.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Our institute brings together leading scientists, clinicians, and researchers dedicated to fighting cancer through groundbreaking research.
